caption: Very nostalgic feeling of Diana I must say. On the flame lies her condolences and journaled memorabilia of perhaps the most influential princesses in our time. You can feel the energy of the chaotic underpass that took her life. Her soul ruminates the atmosphere, over looking the tour de Eiffel and Paris‚Äôs surrounding muses.

Pont d'Alma is a beautiful destination to enjoy a walk and see some of the other sights of Paris.  This bridge over the Seine River gives you some stunning photos of the Eiffel Tower.  Night photography is beyond imagination with the reflections of the city lights on the water and the lighting of the Eiffel Tower.  The area around the bridge is full of life. You can visit the cafes or restaurants there and enjoy a unique experience in this wonderful place.
Surprisingly clean and crowdless bridge to catch a glimpse of the Eiffel tower and pose and click photos, typical for tourists. Make a stop over here while you walk around, recommended!
Amazing view of the Iffel tower. There was a lot of people trying to get pictures but we waited like 5 minutes to be able to take one! Definitely stop by to enjoy the view

Alma‚Äôs Bridge, officially known as Pont de l‚ÄôAlma, spans the Seine River in Paris, connecting the 7th and 8th arrondissements. Originally built in 1854 to commemorate a victory during the Crimean War, the current structure was reconstructed in the 1970s. The bridge is known for its stunning views of the Eiffel Tower and the Flame of Liberty monument, which serves as an unofficial memorial to Princess Diana. Nearby attractions include the Mus√©e du Quai Branly and the Jardins du Trocad√©ro, making it a popular spot for visitors exploring Paris.
A great spot to see the Eiffel Tower at night and during the light show-every hour on the hour and lasts for 5 minutes.
breathtaking place to spot the eiffel tower, especially during olympics games and closed parks (as u can see in pics/video). a bit crowded when it‚Äôs time for the tower to twinkle.

The bridge its self is nothing special, an iron structure spanning the Seine, however on one of the pylons, is a statue that looks older and out of place, as it turns out, Le Zouave, a stone statue of a soldier is in the perfect place as he is the unofficial flood marker for the city.

If you are. Tourist looking for the best spot to capture pictures with the Eiffel Tower as √† background, you can do it at Pont de L‚ÄôAlma. Beautiful scenery with Eiffel Tower standing really eye catching with the beautiful structure.
I walked across the bridge to go to the Eiffel Tower. Beautiful views from all the bridges in Paris.
We stopped on a tour at night to see the Eifel tower. We were lucky with the boat having the flag colors.
One of the most beautiful bridges in the world. You can see the Olympics vibe in my pictures.
This is a great bridge like the tower bridge in London. From this bridge you can enjoy the beauty of the Seine River as well as the Eiffel Tower. Best place to take snaps of both the places.

Alma's bridge at night is a mesmerizing spectacle that captivates the senses. The city lights reflect on the tranquil water below, creating a shimmering dance of colors. The gentle breeze carries the soft hum of the city, providing a serene soundtrack to the stunning visual display. Walking across the bridge feels like stepping into a dream, with the cityscape unfolding in all its glory. The architectural details, subtly illuminated, add a touch of elegance to the experience. Alma's bridge at night is not just a crossing; it's a journey into enchantment, making it deserving of a solid 5-star rating on Google.

Paris is always beautiful, as ever. The walk along the Seine starting from Pont d'Alma right up to Place de la Concorde is breathtaking. Along the river, you come across quite a few famous landmarks. One of them is Assembl√©e Nationale. The Grand Palais and the Petit Palais. And, of course, Eiffel Tower is ever present on the horizon. Then there is the needle at place de la Concorde. The Place de la Concorde is itself impressive. On that square, there is The Crillon, the famous Palace Hotel. On the other side, there is Jardin de la Tuillerie. And this is less than a kilometre of walk.

Couldn't find a more stunning views of Eiffel tower than this bridge, and just walk 5 minutes west to find these beautiful street romantic places, to have a drink or a bite. And extraordinary shots of the river and the tower
Nice place for morning walks.
Many beautiful view in here. I went go there only 10 minutes in there. We can see two cities like separate, between river.
Enjoyed seeing the Eiffel Tower from here
Large enough walking space to take photos without being in the way of the morning commute.

For a great snap of the Eiffel Tower, I recommend taking it from the Alma's bridge. It's a beautiful shot. There's also Beatux Mouches Paris boat ride, were you can enjoy the river Saine just off the bridge.
It is among my favorite places in Paris, for the view on the Eiffel tower üóº and for all the nice promenades, restaurants and museums nearby ‚ú®Ô∏è ‚Ä¶

Great place in front of the tower and to go on a cruise

If you want a quiet place to explore Eiffel, this bridge is perpect, not so crowded, you can get a beautiful shot of the Eiffel Tower . On the side there‚Äôs a restaurant you can eat and drinks, there‚Äôs also food cart for quick bite while staring at Eiffel Tower.
Alma's Bridge visible from the ground and atop a boat cruise, Paris is a delight anyday anytime.
Gorgeous views of the Eiffel tower. Right outside of Princess Diana‚Äôs memorial. Perfect spot for a picture!
It's a nice site. Sadly this is also a memorial for princess Diana.  Definitely worth it to stop by while in Paris.

Absolutely stunning view of the Eiffel Tower and a perfect place to watch the light show.  The light show starts on the hour after sunset, so be mindful of the timing.  It was a cloudy rainy day, but this lit it up

It really gives you wide angle view of capturing the eiffel tower and the other side of the bridge. The view is really breathtaking for photographers if they want to capture such long exposure photographs at night time.
Great views of the Iron Lady from this  ridge. The flame of liberty is located at the end of this bridge to pay tribute to the princes Diana.
Nice beautiful area. Make sure you go to Pierre Hermes dessert cafe.
Favorite vantage point for Eiffel tower
Good Point of view, the heart of The City
A place of great sadness.. But yes a beautiful memorial to a beautiful princess .. Situated on the very overpass where sadly lady Diana had her fatal car crash..

As a tourist I had to pass by there on a daily basis & sometimes more than once ...Every time I set my on eye on that river it was hard to let go ... Bridge named after victory over Russia.
Offers a spectacular view of the Eiffel tower. Right next to a bus stop!
